verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> it <S%G1096>happened<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> those <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> a <S%G1378>decree<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> <S%G828>Augustus<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> should be <S%G583>enrolled.<s%>
<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G582>enrollment<s%> made <S%G1096>when<s%> Quirinius <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2230>governor<s%> of <S%G4947>Syria.<s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> to <S%G583>enroll<s%> <S%G1538>themselves,<s%> everyone <S%G1519>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4172>city.<s%>

<S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2449>Judea,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3965>family<s%> of <S%G1138>David;<s%>
to <S%G583>enroll<s%> himself <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> who was <S%G3423>pledged<s%> to be married to <S%G846>him<s%> as <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G1471>pregnant.<s%>

<S%G1161>It<s%> <S%G1096>happened,<s%> <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1511>were<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> that the <S%G2250>day<s%> had <S%G4130>come<s%> that <S%G846>she<s%> should give <S%G5088>birth.<s%>

<S%G2532>She<s%> brought <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G5207>son,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G4683>wrapped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> in bands of <S%G4683>cloth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G347>laid<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a feeding <S%G5336>trough,<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>room<s%> for <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2646>inn.<s%>

<S%G2532>There<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4166>shepherds<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> staying in the <S%G63>field,<s%> and <S%G5442>keeping<s%> <S%G5438>watch<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4167>flock.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> stood <S%G2186>by<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shone <S%G4034>around<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G5399>were<s%> <S%G3173><s%> <S%G5399>terrified.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> be <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G2097>bring<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> good <S%G2097>news<s%> <S%G5479>of<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2992>to<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> there is <S%G5088>born<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> this <S%G4594>day,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> a <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G5124>This<s%> is the <S%G4592>sign<s%> to <S%G5213>you:<s%> you will <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G1025>baby<s%> wrapped in strips of <S%G4683>cloth,<s%> <S%G2749>lying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a feeding <S%G5336>trough.<s%>"

<S%G1810>Suddenly,<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> a <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G4756>army<s%> <S%G134>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G1391>"Glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5310>highest,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> good <S%G2107>will<s%> <S%G1722>toward<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>"

<S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G1096>happened,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> went <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> that the <S%G4166>shepherds<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G1330>"Let<s%>'s go <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem,<s%> <S%G1211>now,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4487>thing<s%> that has <S%G1096>happened,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has made <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G444>us.<s%>"

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> with <S%G4692>haste,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G429>found<s%> both <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1025>baby<s%> was <S%G2749>lying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the feeding <S%G5037>trough.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1232>it,<s%> they publicized <S%G4012>widely<s%> the <S%G4487>saying<s%> which was <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G3813>child.<s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> who <S%G191>heard<s%> it <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G4012>at<s%> the things <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G4314>shepherds.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G4933>kept<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4487>sayings,<s%> <S%G4820>pondering<s%> them <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G4166>shepherds<s%> <S%G1994>returned,<s%> <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G134>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the things <S%G3739>that<s%> they had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>seen,<s%> just <S%G2531>as<s%> it was <S%G2980>told<s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> were <S%G4130>fulfilled<s%> for the <S%G4059>circumcision<s%> of the <S%G3813>child,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> which was <S%G2564>given<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G4815>conceived<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2532>womb.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2512>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2512>purification<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> were <S%G4130>fulfilled,<s%> they <S%G321>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> up <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%G3936>present<s%> him to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>

<S%G2531>(as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3956>"Every<s%> <S%G730>male<s%> who <S%G1272>opens<s%> the <S%G3388>womb<s%> shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>"),

<S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1325>offer<s%> a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> that which is <S%G2046>said<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> "A <S%G2201>pair<s%> of <S%G5167>turtledoves,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3502>young<s%> <S%G4058>pigeons.<s%>"

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G4826>Simeon.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2126>devout,<s%> <S%G4327>looking<s%> for the <S%G3874>consolation<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532>It<s%> had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G5537>revealed<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> that he <S%G1492>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> he had <S%G1492>seen<s%> <S%G5547>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>'s <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple.<s%> <S%G1722>When<s%> the <S%G1118>parents<s%> brought <S%G1521>in<s%> the <S%G3813>child,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that they might <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1480>custom<s%> of the <S%G846>law,<s%>

<S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1209><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G43>arms,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%>

<S%G3568>"Now<s%> <S%G630>you<s%> are <S%G630>releasing<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G1203>Master,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4487>word,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace;<s%>
<S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> have <S%G1492>seen<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4992>salvation,<s%>
<S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G2596>before<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2992>peoples;<s%>

a <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%> to the <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2992>of<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>"

<S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> were <S%G2296>marveling<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the things which were <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2258>him,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> child is <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G4431>falling<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G386>rising<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%> which is spoken <S%G483>against.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yes,<s%> a <S%G4501>sword<s%> will pierce <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G5590>soul,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> the <S%G1261>thoughts<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2588%G99999>hearts<s%> may be <S%G601>revealed.<s%>"

<S%G2532>There<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> one <S%G451>Anna,<s%> a <S%G4398>prophetess,<s%> the <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G5323>Phanuel,<s%> <S%G4260>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G768>Asher<s%> <S%G846>(she<s%> was <S%G4260>of<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4260>age,<s%> having <S%G2198>lived<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> a <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>virginity,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>she<s%> had been a <S%G5503>widow<s%> for <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G3589>eighty-four<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>), <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G3000>worshipping<s%> with <S%G3521>fastings<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1162>petitions<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>day.<s%>

<S%G2532>Coming<s%> <S%G2186>up<s%> at <S%G846>that<s%> very <S%G5610>hour,<s%> <S%G846>she<s%> gave <S%G437>thanks<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> those who were <S%G4327>looking<s%> for <S%G3085>redemption<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3778>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G5613>When<s%> they had <S%G5055>accomplished<s%> all <S%G537>things<s%> that were according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> they <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> was <S%G837>growing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was becoming <S%G2901>strong<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> being <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
<S%G846>His<s%> <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G2094>year<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> at the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G3957>Passover.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> he <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> years <S%G2094>old,<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> according <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1485>custom<s%> of the <S%G1859>feast,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> had <S%G5048>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G1722>as<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G5290>returning,<s%> the <S%G3816>boy<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> stayed <S%G5278>behind<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> know <S%G1097>it,<s%>
